product_name: NRS Adventurer Inflatable Stand Up Paddle Board - 12' 6 "
long_description: Designed specifically for adventure touring, the Adventurer has ample tie-downs for your gear and 6 in.of air volume to efficiently take you and your gear on your next big journey.
